product_entries.full_product_description: With 100mm dia 3M long CI Pipe electrode

Providing and fixing of earth electrode earth station complete with brick masonary chamber, GI cover, GI frame, GI watering funnel etc. The GI frame / chamber shall be of 300 x 300 mm. The rate shall also include necessary back filling componds for each earth pit as per manufacturer's guidelines. The unit shall be similar to T39 of Ashlok earthpit of height 3000mm and outer dia of 80mm .
product_entries.size: frame/chamber: 300 x 300 mm, height: 3000mm, outer diameter: 80mm
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: chamber: brick masonary, cover: gi, frame: gi, watering funnel: gi, feature: necessary back filling compounds as per manufacturer's guidelines, reference: similar to T39 of Ashlok earthpit

product_entries.full_product_description: Suitable size of Threaded rod to be used for respective raceways at distance of 1500mm each.
100 x 40mm raceway shall be with 6mm threaded rod. 150 x 40mm to 250 x 40mm raceway shall be with 8mm threaded rod. 300 x 40mm to 450 x 40mm raceway shall be with 12mm threaded rod.

original_rows.1: Secondary looping light point for normal circuits with 3cx1.5 sq.mm  PVC insulated  FRLS copper cable
Secondary looping light point for emg  With 3cx1.5 sq.mm  PVC insulated  FRLS copper cable
EARTHING
With 100mm dia 3M long CI Pipe electrode

Providing and fixing of earth electrode earth station complete with brick masonary chamber, GI cover, GI frame, GI watering funnel etc. The GI frame / chamber shall be of 300 x 300 mm. The rate shall also include necessary back filling componds for each earth pit as per manufacturer's guidelines. The unit shall be similar to T39 of Ashlok earthpit of height 3000mm and outer dia of 80mm .
Earthing Conductors
Lead connection means to do proper bracing between joints wherever applicable. No joints to be connected with nut & bolt
All GI & CU strips to be mounted on insulator at a regular distance & inside MS powder coated box.
PVC sleeves needs to provided for all Cu strips.
Vendor to provide bimetallic strip for required size wherever required
GI conductors
50 x 10 mm  GI earth strip.
50 x 6 mm  GI earth strip.
25 x 3 mm  GI earth strip.
8 SWG GI WIRE
8 SWG CU  WIRE
CU conductors
25 x 3 mm  Cu earth strip with PVC sleeves.
1C x 6sqmm for rack body, third pin earthing, MCB DB body earthing and Other equipements
1C x 16sqmm for rack body body earthing

300mm long, 50 x 3 GI Earth bus suitable for terminating 8 SWG copper wire with holes at regular intervals connected to main bus. The same need to be mounted in MS powder coated box with transperent cover.

300mm long, 25 x 3 Copper Earth bus suitable for terminating 6sqmm copper wire with holes at regular intervals connected to main bus. The same need to be mounted in MS powder coated box with transperent cover.
FLOOR/ CEILING RACEWAYS

Supply, installation of raceways of following sizes made out of 1.6 mm thick Pregalvanised sheet complete with Push type for ceiling & screwed type cover for floor & wall drops of below specified thickness with counter sunk type screws.
Note : The rate quoted shall include providing earthing for the Wireway trunking with support hardware. (Usage of jumper wire at joining is acceptable)
Suitable size of Threaded rod to be used for respective raceways at distance of 1500mm each.
100 x 40mm raceway shall be with 6mm threaded rod. 150 x 40mm to 250 x 40mm raceway shall be with 8mm threaded rod. 300 x 40mm to 450 x 40mm raceway shall be with 12mm threaded rod.
Ceiling raceway
100mm x 50mm GI  raceway with 1mm thick cover-
150mm x 50mm GI  raceway with 1mm thick cover-
